selection_reasoning: Selected top 2 performers (equal-radii and penalty method) for refinement, plus corner-first for a different geometric strategy. Added gradient descent and simulated annealing for their optimization potential - both could significantly improve with better tuning. The physics simulation (trial_0_2) and genetic algorithm (trial_0_7) underperformed, suggesting those approaches need major rework.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best score at 2.6153 (98.96% of optimal). Equal radii initialization + optimization is very effective. Good candidate for refinement.
Second best at 2.6032. Penalty method optimization is a solid approach that could benefit from parameter tuning.
Third best at 2.5736. Corner-first hierarchical is a fundamentally different greedy strategy worth exploring - corners are geometrically advantageous.
Gradient descent at 2.5098 has optimization potential. The approach is sound but may need better initialization or more iterations.
Simulated annealing at 2.1028 underperformed but the metaheuristic approach could work much better with proper temperature schedule and longer runs.
